name: NubiferOS 1.0 "Nimbus" (Alpha)
body:
## What's New

First public alpha release of NubiferOS!

### Features
- Workspace isolation with Firejail
- GPG + pass credential encryption
- 50+ cloud tools pre-configured
- LUKS full disk encryption
- GNOME 43 with Wayland

### Known Issues
- See [KNOWN_ISSUES.md](https://github.com/nubiferos/nubiferos/blob/trunk/docs/KNOWN_ISSUES.md)
